description: This file implements an in-memory, thread-safe repository for Note objects following the INoteRepository interface, providing CRUD operations and using concurrent collections for thread safety.

classes.name: InMemoryNoteRepository
classes.description: A thread-safe in-memory repository for notes implementing CRUD operations.

methods.name: Create
methods.description: Adds a new note to the repository and returns it.

methods.name: GetAll
methods.description: Retrieves all notes ordered by their last update time in descending order.

methods.name: GetById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its unique identifier.

methods.name: Update
methods.description: Updates an existing note in the repository if it exists.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Removes a note from the repository by its identifier.
